title: Life Imitates Stonetoss
author: VD
content_html:
Apparently KFC is now basing its commercials on Stonetoss memes. Because doesn’t seeing white women rejecting white men in favor of vibrant miscegenation make you want to buy the corpocracy’s products?

DISCUSS ON SG

STONETOSS
Apparently KFC is now basing its commercials
on Stonetoss memes
. Because doesn’t seeing white women rejecting white men in favor of vibrant miscegenation make you want to buy the corpocracy’s products?
